item.description:
Announcing dinner at Polcari's of Woburn!!

We have dined here before, (the food is so good), and this venue does such a good job of accommodating a group, that it's simply a divine idea to go back!

Polcari's features a great assortment of Italian favorites, as well as famous Regina's Pizza! (yum)
Their Wedding Soup is very de-lish too! Don't even ask about the lasagna!

This dinner is scheduled before the 8:00pm "Perfect Harmony" theatre meetup in nearby Stoneham, and should allow plenty of time for those who wish to attend both.

Even if you're not going to the play, please consider joining us for an early Saturday evening of good food and good company!

NOTE: We will be seated as a group in the 2nd floor bar area this time!

Note: this meetup is also scheduled with these groups: Meeting & Greeting in Southern NH & the Merrimack Valley, Northern Middlesex Singles, and The Boston Providence Single Parents.

Ask the hostess for Jill's group, or find us upstairs in the bar area.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the hostess for Jill's group- we will be upstairs in the bar area

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Saturday evening Italian dinner in the North Suburbs!
